text: Ziegfeld Follies is a 1946 American musical comedy movie directed by Vincente Minnelli, Lemuel Ayers, Roy Del Ruth, Robert Lewis, Merrill Pye, George Sidney, Charles Walters. It stars Fred Astaire, Lucille Ball, Judy Garland, Esther Williams, Victor Moore, Red Skelton, William Powell, Gene Kelly and was distributed by Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1940s American musical movies Category:1946 comedy movies Category:American musical comedy movies Category:MGM movies Category:Movies directed by Vincente Minnelli Category:Movies directed by George Sidney Category:Movies directed by Charles Walters Category:Movies directed by Roy Del Ruth
title: Ziegfeld Follies (movie)
